name: zeldaxd-mercurischess.zip
items: The Legend of Zelda: Mercuris Chess.sh

attr.title: The Legend of Zelda: Mercuris Chess
attr.desc: The sequel to Mystery of Solarus XD. While Link and Zelda were away, a rich businessman bought Hyrule! There begins your next adventure, in a world where everything has a price and where truth and lies become undistinguishable.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://solarus-games.org/games/the-legend-of-zelda-xd2-mercuris-chess/ and put in the ports/zeldaxd-mercurischess folder.
